verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, What is the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> more than any <S%H6086>tree<s%>, or than a <S%H2156>branch<s%> which is among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>?

Shall <S%H6086>wood<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> there to <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%>? or will men <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3489>pin<s%> of it to <S%H8518>hang<s%> any vessel on <S%H3627>it<s%>?

<S%H5414>Behold<s%>, it is cast into the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel<s%>; the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of <S%H8432>it<s%>, and the midst of it is <S%H2787>burned<s%>. Is it <S%H6743>good<s%> for any <S%H4399>work<s%>?

<S%H8549>Behold<s%>, when it was whole, it was <S%H6213>good<s%> for no <S%H4399>work<s%>: how much less shall it be <S%H6213>good<s%> yet for any <S%H4399>work<s%>, when the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H2787>it<s%>, and it is burned?

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; As the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel<s%>, so will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H3318>them<s%>; they shall go out from one <S%H784>fire<s%>, and another <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>; and you shall know that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I <S%H7760>set<s%> my face against <S%H6440>them<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, because they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.
